Child Minding Services

While we do not have any space for children to attend the event itself, there are child-minding services available from the hotel. We may be able to accomodate infants however, where the child-minding services are not suitable. Please get in touch to discuss. The costs and details of the child-minding services are as follows:

Service fee: THB 400 net per hour
Policy: 1 babysitter can take care of a maximum 2 children and charge THB 700 net per hour. THB 200 taxi fee for service after 10.00 pm
Payment: Pay by cash directly to babysitter.
If guests needs to charge to the room, a 10% surcharge will be applied.
